pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Clickhouse Arrow üè† üèπA minimal [ClickHouse](https://clickhouse.com) client that uses the HTTP API and Apache Arrow.You should probably use [Clickhouse Connect](https://github.com/ClickHouse/clickhouse-connect) instead.### Installation```bashpip install clickhouse_arrow```### Examples```pythonimport clickhouse_arrow as chimport pyarrow as pa# Initialise a clientclient = ch.Client("http://localhost:8123", password="password")# Create a tableclient.execute( """ CREATE TABLE test ( col1 Int64, col2 String ) ENGINE = Memory """,)# Import a tabletable = pa.Table.from_pydict( { "col1": [1, 2, 3], "col2": ["a", "b", "d"], },)client.insert("test", table)# Read into a tabletable = client.read_table("SELECT * FROM test")print(table)# Read iterator of batchesbatches = client.read_batches("SELECT * FROM test")for batch in batches: print(batch)# Use query parameterstable = client.read_table( """ SELECT * FROM test WHERE col1 = {value:Int64} """, params={"value": 2},)print(table)# Use query settingstable = client.read_table( "SELECT col2 FROM test", settings={"output_format_arrow_string_as_string": 1},)print(table["col2"])```
